name: International Conference on Smart Systems and Innovative Technologies ICOSSIT 2022
content: International Conference on Smart Systems and Innovative Technologies (ICOSSIT 2022) is organised with a primary objective of bringing together scientists, researchers, academicians and industrial experts in the field of Digital Technology and Innovations to a common forum. It aims to be one of the leading international conferences for presenting novel and fundamental advances in the digital era as Smart Systems and Innovative Technologies. The conference will mainly focus on recent advances in the fields of Electronics, Computing, Artificial Intelligence and Wireless Communication. Peer-reviewed accepted papers will be published in IRO Journals.
